LanguageData.JRWTupandactylusReconstruct.label: Tupandactylus
LanguageData.JRWTupandactylusReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03321-2007 [TUPANDACTYLUS IMPERATOR] CODENAME: SAIL >3729
A pterosaur with a big, rounded crest. These crest are often more colourful and larger in males, possibly to impress mates when the time comes.
